import React from 'react'; import {connect} from 'react-redux' import CartItem from '../cart-item/cart-item' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {selectCartItems} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/custom-button' import './cart.dropdown.style.scss' const Cart=({cartItems,history})=>(//distruturing cartItems
{ cartItems.length? cartItems.map(cartItem=>( //mapping in cartItems to display eachone in )) : Your cart is empty }
{ cartItems.length? CHECK OUT : null }
) const mapStateToProps =createStructuredSelector ({//distructuring what we need from state cartItems:selectCartItems }) export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps) (Cart))//connecting to store
